Rum.name: Dark and Stormy
Rum.directions: Fill a tall glass with ice cubes and add rum. Add ginger beer and lime juice. Stir.

Rum.name: Daiquiri
Rum.directions: Squeeze the lime into your shaker, stir in sugar, and add rum. Shake well with cracked ice, then strain into glass.

Tequila.name: Mexican Mule
Tequila.directions: Pour all liquids together and stir. Garnish with lime wedge and jalapeño slices
